story.title: Nice
story.content: Libra ia super nice to everyone, except themselves

story.title: Control
story.content: Libras are hard to control when they are upset. It's like a switch goes off and they turn raging mad.

story.title: Orders
story.content: No need to give Libra orders, they won't obey them anyway.

story.title: Languages
story.content: All Libras speak at least five languages: English, Profanity, Sarcasm, Truth and Love.

story.title: Strength
story.content: Cooperative, Diplomatic, Gracious, Fair-minded, Social.

story.title: Weakness
story.content: Indecisive, Avoids confrontations, Will carry a grudge, Self-pity.

story.title: Likes
story.content: Harmony, Gentleness, Sharing with others, The outdoors.

story.title: Dislikes
story.content: Violence, Injustice, Loudmouths, Conformity.

story.title: Mission
story.content: To establish harmonious relationships with others so you can spread justice, fairness and equality in a spirit of cooperation.

story.title: Rational
story.content: You are a rational and highly intellectual person, who has an excellent mind, and you are capable of seeing all sides of a problem.

story.title: Admit
story.content: Though you don't like to admit it, everything and everyone is a mixture of good and bad, and that includes you.

story.title: Trendy
story.content: You like to know what people are doing and wearing, where the latest trendy cafe is and you enjoy a good gossip too.

story.title: Friend
story.content: Libra-born are fun and always willing to help, which makes them great friends.

story.title: Organize
story.content: This flexible zodiac sign loves spending time with friends and family and will not hesitate when it's needed to organize some gathering.

story.title: Challenges
story.content: When it comes to challenges, Libra-born know how to see the solution to disagreements.

story.title: Compatibility
story.content: Gemini, Aquarius.

story.title: Priority
story.content: Finding the right partner will be a priority in the life of people born under the sign of Libra.

story.title: Loneliness
story.content: Loneliness is unnatural and very sad for the Libra.

story.title: Lovers
story.content: As lovers, they are expressive, creative and balanced.

story.title: Compatibility
story.content: Aries.

story.title: Importance
story.content: You know that love makes the world go around. You're a true romantic.

story.title: Learn
story.content: To feel passion.

story.title: Dream Diary
story.content: Keep a dream diary and learn the language of the unconscious.

story.title: Recognise
story.content: Recognise that there is no light without dark, nor dark without light

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Jimmy Carter - 39th U.S. President

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Mahatma Gandhi - Civil rights leader

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Julia Gillard - Former Prime Minister of Australia

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Olivia Newton John- Singer
